subject: [PATCH 0/9] cxl: explicit DAX driver selection and hotplug

reviews.author: Gregory Price (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer raised concerns about the implementation of online_type in memory_hotplug.c, specifically questioning whether using a uint8_t for online_types is sufficient and suggesting that it might be better to use an array instead.

reviews.author: Cheatham, Benjamin
reviews.summary: Reviewer Cheatham pointed out implementation issues in the patch, specifically that devm_cxl_add_sysram_region() is never called outside of sysram_region_driver::probe(), and questioned the order of device addition and probing.

reviews.author: Jonathan Cameron
reviews.summary: Reviewer Jonathan Cameron raised several comments, mostly minor and trivial, but also requested an explanation for the design choice of moving pmem region driver logic into a separate file and questioned the flexibility of the new drivers.

reviews.author: David (arm)
reviews.summary: Reviewer David raised concerns about code quality and suggested casting a variable to its proper type in one place, but did not object to the patch's functionality.
